as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

:v-model.description: The controlled value of the Combobox. Can be binded-with with `v-model`.
:v-model.description_zh: Combobox 的受控值。可以用 `v-model` 绑定。

defaultValue.description: The value of the combobox when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the Combobox.
defaultValue.description_zh: Combobox 初始渲染时的值。当你不需要控制 Combobox 的状态时使用。

open.description: The controlled open state of the Combobox. Can be binded-with with `v-model:open`.
open.description_zh: Combobox 的受控打开状态。可以用 `v-model:open` 绑定。

defaultOpen.description: The open state of the combobox when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh: Combobox 初始渲染时的打开状态。当你不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

searchTerm.description: The controlled search term of the Combobox. Can be binded-with v-model:searchTerm.
searchTerm.description_zh: Combobox 的受控搜索词。可以用 v-model:searchTerm 绑定。

selectedValue.description: The current highlighted value of the Combobox. Can be binded-with `v-model:selectedValue`.
selectedValue.description_zh: Combobox 当前高亮的值。可以用 `v-model:selectedValue` 绑定。

multiple.description: Whether multiple options can be selected or not.
multiple.description_zh: 是否可以选择多个选项。

disabled.description: When `true`, prevents the user from interacting with Combobox.
disabled.description_zh: 当 `true` 时，阻止用户与 Combobox 交互。

name.description: The name of the Combobox. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.
name.description_zh: Combobox 的名称。作为名称/值对的一部分与其所属表单一起提交。

dir.description: The reading direction of the combobox when applicable. If omitted, inherits globally from `ConfigProvider` or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.
dir.description_zh: Combobox 的阅读方向（如果适用）。如果省略，则全局继承自 `ConfigProvider` 或假定为 LTR（从左到右）阅读模式。

filterFunction.description: The custom filter function for filtering `ComboboxItem`.
filterFunction.description_zh: 用于过滤 `ComboboxItem` 的自定义过滤函数。

displayValue.description: The display value of input for selected item. Does not work with `multiple`.
displayValue.description_zh: 所选项目的输入显示值。不适用于 `multiple`。

resetSearchTermOnBlur.description: Whether to reset the searchTerm when the Combobox input blurred.
resetSearchTermOnBlur.description_zh: 当 Combobox 输入失焦时是否重置 searchTerm。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event handler called when the value changes.
events.description_zh: 值更改时调用的事件处理程序。

events.name: update:open
events.description: Event handler called when the open state of the combobox changes.
events.description_zh: Combobox 的打开状态更改时调用的事件处理程序。

events.name: update:searchTerm
events.description: Event handler called when the searchTerm of the combobox changes.
events.description_zh: Combobox 的搜索词更改时调用的事件处理程序。

events.name: update:selectedValue
events.description: Event handler called when the highlighted value of the combobox changes.
events.description_zh: Combobox 的高亮值更改时调用的事件处理程序。
